title: The Vassal of Magic
description: Wilf Gilvary is a slave to the magic he hates…Magic’s hold over Wilf is increasing. If only he could tap into his magic’s full potential, then perhaps he could find a way to free himself. When finding a piece of the shattered Mages Crystal plunges Wilf into the mysteries and power struggles of an ancient realm he starts to question whether he can ever break free. He even starts to doubt that his affection for Katryna is real. Wilf is left facing impossible choices: forever abandon his dreams of life as a Normal in Hong Kong, or allow magic, the ancient realm of Mulkulth and Katryna to perish.
author: C.B. Lyall
